meanings.definition: The quality or state of being irreconcilable.
meanings.sent1: The irreconcilableness of their opinions led to constant arguments.
meanings.sent2: The irreconcilableness of the two political parties made compromise impossible.
meanings.sent3: The irreconcilableness of the siblings' tastes in music always caused funny disagreements.
meanings.sent4: The irreconcilableness between tradition and progress is a timeless struggle.
meanings.sent5: The irreconcilableness of oil and water serves as a perfect analogy for their relationship.

meanings.definition: The inability to be reconciled or resolved.
meanings.sent1: The irreconcilableness of their conflicting schedules made it hard to meet up.
meanings.sent2: The irreconcilableness of their differences in opinion created a permanent divide.
meanings.sent3: The irreconcilableness of the puzzle pieces being forced together was comical.
meanings.sent4: The irreconcilableness of the storm clouds and sunshine mirrored their tumultuous relationship.
meanings.sent5: The irreconcilableness of the two magnets pushing each other away was fascinating to watch.
